short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The new kPoint extension allows you to capture your screen and also enhance the searchability of your kPoint videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The new kPoint extension for chrome browser allows you to record your screen and also enhance the searchability of your kPoint videos. Install this extension along with kPoint screen sharing plugin from your kPoint domain.
